trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be set to a value within a range.
trans-unit.target: 公开一些方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问可在一定范围内设置为值的控件。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定控件的值是否是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为只读的，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果可以修改它，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that is not read-only.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控件不是只读的此方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> property when a large change is made, such as with the PAGE DOWN key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，当发生大更改时（例如按下了 Page Down 键），会将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

trans-unit.source: The large-change value supported by the control or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the control does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.LargeChange" />.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的显著更改值 (<see langword="Nothing" />在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持<see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.LargeChange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that has a large change value of 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控件的显著更改值为 5.0，此方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum range value supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的最大范围值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value supported by the control or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the control does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Maximum" />.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的最大值 (<see langword="Nothing" />在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持<see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Maximum" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that has a maximum value of 255.0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控件 255.0 的最大值，此方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum range value supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的最小范围值。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value supported by the control or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the control does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Minimum" />.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的最小值 (<see langword="Nothing" />在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持<see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Minimum" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that has a minimum value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控件的最小值为 0.0，此方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The actual value set depends on the control implementation.
trans-unit.target: 设置的实际值取决于控件的实现。

trans-unit.source: The control may round the requested `value` up or down.
trans-unit.target: 控件可能舍入请求`value`上移或下移。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此方法对于自定义控件的一种可能的实现。

trans-unit.source: The custom control displays its range value through the alpha value of its base color.
trans-unit.target: 自定义控件显示其基的颜色的 alpha 值通过其范围值。

trans-unit.source: When <paramref name="value" /> is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="value" /> 小于控件的最小值或大于控件的最大值时。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> property when a small change is made, such as with an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，当发生小更改时（例如按下了某个箭头键），会将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

trans-unit.source: The small-change value or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the control does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.SmallChange" />.
trans-unit.target: 小更改值或 null (<see langword="Nothing" />在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持<see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.SmallChange" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that has a small change value of 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控件的小更改值为 1.0，此方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the control or null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the control does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 控件或为 null 的值 (<see langword="Nothing" />在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持<see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of this method for a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此方法的自定义控件的实现。

trans-unit.source: For the purposes of this sample, the custom control displays the value through the alpha setting of its base color.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的目的，自定义控件显示通过其基础颜色的 alpha 设置的值。
